1081730.name: 3D Organon XR
1081730.description:
****PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS THE ENTERPRISE EDITION OF 3D ORGANON XR****

To access your institution’s subscription, please contact your program administrator or email prosupport@3dorganon.com.

No account? No problem. Guest Mode offers 2 hours of full access to all features—completely free, no login required. After that, enjoy continued access to selected models and features.

3D Organon is the world’s leading medical XR and healthcare education platform, transforming how anatomy and clinical knowledge are explored, taught, and mastered. With immersive 3D environments, lifelike models, and powerful AI-driven tools, 3D Organon sets a new benchmark for modern healthcare education.

The platform goes far beyond traditional anatomy apps by delivering an all-in-one suite of features—from 3D anatomy exploration and XR Medical Imaging to ultrasound simulation, clinical quizzes, and the Medverse multi-user learning environment. Whether you're teaching, studying, or presenting, 3D Organon is designed to support a broad spectrum of educational needs.

New in This Version: AI Study Assistant

Meet your intelligent anatomy tutor. The newly introduced AI Study Assistant delivers real-time learning support, helping users navigate complex topics, receive personalized guidance, and get anatomy explanations instantly—revolutionizing self-directed study and classroom integration.

With interactive tools, clinical correlations, upmarket visualization technologies, and a multilingual anatomical knowledge base, 3D Organon bridges the gap between theoretical concepts and clinical application. Its definitions are aligned with the official Terminologia Anatomica and translated into 16 languages by academic experts.

Trusted by over 600 prestigious institutions and endorsed by industry leaders such as Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg and HTC’s Cher Wang, 3D Organon has been spotlighted in global keynotes and featured in leading publications like Forbes.

Recognized by over 600 institutions worldwide and spotlighted in Meta keynotes, HTC showcases, and top publications like Forbes, 3D Organon is trusted by the global academic and healthcare community.

Guest Mode Access (Free):

  • Full access to all features for the first 2 hours

  • Continued access to:

    • Male & female skeletal systems

    • Connective tissues

    • Joint movement animations

    • Selected anatomical definitions

    • Platform updates and UI enhancements

Subscription Unlocks Full Access to:

  • All 15 body systems (male/female)

  • XR Medical Imaging with DICOM integration

  • 15 detailed microscopic anatomy models

  • Cadaveric image library

  • USMLE-style clinical quizzes and questions

  • Organ, brain, and muscle mapping tools

  • Body actions with 550+ animations

  • Tumor growth and pain visualization tools

  • Multi-user Medverse sessions

  • Immersive digital dissection tools

  • Advanced features like slicing, exploding, and diagram tools

  • Ultrasound simulator

  • Advanced course customization and multi-camera video stream integration

Medverse: A Paradigm Shift in Medical Education 

The 3D Organon Medverse is a next-generation virtual learning environment where students and educators collaborate in real time. With multi-user access, cross-platform compatibility, and integrated teaching tools, Medverse enables institutions to host dynamic, interactive lessons beyond physical boundaries.

Who Is 3D Organon For?

Designed for medical and allied health students, educators, physicians, patients, artists, and curious minds, 3D Organon supports a wide range of educational needs. With accurate anatomical modeling, intuitive navigation, and tools developed by medical professionals, it simplifies complex concepts for beginners and experts alike.

Key Highlights:

  • Blazing fast performance and redesigned UI

  • Over 17,000 detailed anatomical structures

  • Thousands of microscopic anatomy elements in 3D

  • AI Study Assistant for personalized learning

  • Accurate, expert-verified anatomical definitions

  • Real-time male/female model switching

  • Explode, slice, annotate, and diagram tools

  • Organ, muscle, and bone mapping features

  • Favorites, multi-select, and scene management

  • X-ray mode, and live search

  • Built-in video recording and pain/tumor simulation tools

Microscopic Anatomy Models Include:

Glomerulus, Nephron, Liver lobule, Bone cross-section, Skin, Tooth, Capillary bed, Bronchial tree, Small intestine, Peripheral nerve, Skeletal muscle fiber, Cranial nerve nuclei,and many more…

Available Languages:
English, Latin (terminology), Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, French, Russian, Ukrainian, Georgian, Polish, Thai, Greek (UI), Dutch. Combine two languages simultaneously.

Visit our webpage for more info on 3D Organon apps.
1081730.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文, 法语, 希腊语, 俄语, 乌克兰语, 荷兰语
